name: Getaway on Stoney Lake
tagline: Cottage • 10 guests • 3 bedrooms • 1 bath • Sofa bed
descriptionShort: Spacious 1500 sq/ft. Hot Tub, Sauna and Cold Plunge. Great time to reconnect with your partner and rejuvenate. Or make this the ultimate family vacation. Free wifi & cable. Tesla EV charger on site. Bring adapter if needed. Great cell coverage. Gas, restaurant, convenience, LCBO & boat launch all within 10 minutes.
descriptionLong: Spacious 1500 sq/ft. Hot Tub, Sauna and Cold Plunge. Great time to reconnect with your partner and rejuvenate. Or make this the ultimate family vacation. Free wifi & cable. Tesla EV charger on site. Bring adapter if needed. Great cell coverage. Gas, restaurant, convenience, LCBO & boat launch all within 10 minutes. Dock & bay up to 30 ft boat. Great swimming & sandy beach. 2 canoes, 2 kayaks, 2 paddle boards and life jackets. Great fishing. Board games and TV with DVD player. Fully reno'd in 2020.

This is fully modernized with central, forced air heating, modern kitchen and amenities. Every lawn sport and water sport you can imagine. Additional Guests could be accommodated. Please contact host with inquiries. Three bedrooms plus a sofa bed.
Enjoy the entire property to yourself. A remote area on the lake, you can see your neighbours in the distance.
Electronic coded locks. Codes provided on booking. Fully appointed.
shortDescription: Spacious 1500 sq/ft. Hot Tub, Sauna and Cold Plunge — perfect for families or couples.
